snippet: In World War II, the country produced the feared Mitsubishi Zero fighter planes. Today, the same company is working on a regional jet that it hopes will propel it into the industry’s big leagues.
abstract: Mitsubishi Aircraft Corporation is planning first flight of its Mitsubishi Regional Jet, 90-seat commercial plane that it hopes will launch Japan's biggest aviation comeback since World War II and propel it into industry's big leagues after nearly 70 years.
lead_paragraph: In World War II, the country produced the feared Mitsubishi Zero fighter planes. Today, the same company is working on a regional jet that it hopes will propel it into the industry’s big leagues.

headline.seo: Japan Joins the Jet Age by Making Its Own Plane
headline.main: Japan Re-Emerges in the Aerospace Arena With a New Jet
headline.print_headline: At Last, Joining the Jet Age
